personalInfo.name: Karthick
personalInfo.about: With a background in CSE, I now apply my expertise to software development, blending aesthetics, functionality, and innovation. My goal is to develop modern, user-focused that bring your vision to life.

projects.title: Folio Lynkr
projects.description: Folio Lynkr is a platform that allows you to create a portfolio website in minutes. As a user you can select a template which suits you the best and then fill out the form which asks for the details you want to add in your portfolio then pay and host your portfolio website on our platform itself

projects.title: Caliber Tech Website
projects.description: Caliber Tech is a web based startup which provides web pages for small shops and vendors in affordable price with unaffordable quality. Here the user can also buy source codes for the websites which are already developed and hosted on Folio Lynkr

projects.title: MacOS Portfolio
projects.description: This is a portfolio template which is completley developed based on macOS used in macbook, a dynamic website which consist of main macos features like login,shutdown, terminal, browser, VS-Code, Notes App, Safari,Control Center etc, this even has its app listed as projects done. This project challenged the CSS skills of mine and knowledge.

projects.title: Netflix Clone
projects.description: This Netflix website clone was developed as a comprehensive project aimed at honing skills in API fetching, posting data, rendering components across various pages, and implementing backend APIs for handling email and password data using MongoDB with Node and Express. It gave valuable insights into managing states and utilizing hooks effectively.

careerHistory.title: Fullstack Developer
careerHistory.description: Developing a Enterprise React and .NET application for 'UNILEVER' to manage different formats of data shared via sellers across the globe regarding sale of product in a particular month, Gave a deep insight in React and its libraries for optimizing performance

careerHistory.title: Freelancing Fullstack Developer
careerHistory.description: Developed a landing page for JASSMEDIA company to showcase their work and company information , Utilized the MERN stack for efficient development, incorporating Node.js and Node mailer to handle user interactions

careerHistory.title: Freelancing Frontend Developer
careerHistory.description: Developed the front end for an e-commerce site using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript , Participated in regular client meetings to ensure alignment with project requirements ,Collaborated with the backend team to ensure seamless integration , Implemented responsive design principles to ensure optimal performance across various devices

faqs.question: How do you ensure that your designs meet user needs and business goals?
faqs.answer: I follow a user-centered design process that begins with thorough research and stakeholder interviews. This helps me understand both user needs and business objectives, which I then translate into functional, aesthetic solutions.

faqs.question: Do you offer freelance or contract design services?
faqs.answer: Yes, I offer both freelance and contract design services. I can work on project-based assignments or longer-term contracts, adapting to your team's needs and workflow.

faqs.question: Can you walk me through a specific project in your portfolio?
faqs.answer: I'd be happy to discuss any project in detail. Each case study in my portfolio includes the challenge, process, solutions, and outcomes. Let's schedule a call to dive deeper into the ones you're interested in.

faqs.question: What tools and software do you use for your design work?
faqs.answer: I primarily use industry-standard tools like Figma, Sketch, and Adobe Creative Suite. I also work with prototyping tools like Framer and collaborate using tools like Notion and Miro.
